Terms and Conditions

  1. Acceptance of Terms

    By accessing and using HAAI.BIO, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services.

  2. Description of Services

    HAAI.BIO is a link in bio developer that allows users to create personalized landing pages to share their important links and content. We provide a platform for users to manage and customize their link in bio pages.

  3. User Obligations

    • You are responsible for the accuracy and legality of the information and links you provide on your HAAI.BIO page.
    • You agree not to use HAAI.BIO for any illegal or unauthorized purposes.
    • You will not engage in any activity that may disrupt the functioning of HAAI.BIO or interfere with other users' experience.
    • You are solely responsible for maintaining the security of your account login credentials.

  4. Privacy

    • We respect your privacy and handle your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
    • By using HAAI.BIO, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.

  5. Payment and Fees

    • You agree to pay the fees associated with the use of HAAI.BIO as indicated on our pricing page.
    • All payments are processed through secure third-party payment gateways. We do not store your payment information on our servers.

  6. Limitation of Liability

    • HAAI.BIO is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations regarding the availability, reliability, or accuracy of the platform.
    • We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of HAAI.BIO.

  7. Termination

    We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to HAAI.BIO at any time, without prior notice, if you violate these Terms and Conditions.

  8. Amendments

    We may modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. The updated terms will be effective upon posting on HAAI.BIO. It is your responsibility to review the terms periodically.

  9. Governing Law

    These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Indonesia. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Indonesia.
